Get to know TF Meet

ThreeFold Meet is a P2P alternative to centralized video conferencing solutions.

Sam Taggart

17 December 2020



Watch [the live demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C7BH_o9JbW0&t=815s).

*ThreeFold Meet ensures end-to-end connection between parties rather than inefficiently going through centralized servers which may be far away and lacking in privacy and security.*

ThreeFold @ Odyssey Momentum 2020!

Momentum is an online event of 49 hours with more than 2,000 participants and 105 teams working on 21 complex 21st-century problems.

ThreeFold partners with SKALE to empower its developer community

SKALE and ThreeFold are excited to announce their collaborative partnership that will focus on solving scalability and decentralization limitations faced by Ethereum and Blockchain developers.
